lyric:
[by:Parisites]
[ti:Last Goodbye]
[ar:Dreweybear; Vaance; wilo wilde]
[al:Last Goodbye]
[by:九九Lrc歌词网～www.99Lrc.net]
[00:15.65]In a place where we belong
[00:20.53]Just wanna stay forever
[00:23.92]This is now expired love
[00:28.83]I think it’s time for better, I think it’s time for better
[00:33.17]This is our last goodbye
[00:36.98]Won’t you just hold me tight
[00:39.29]Goodbye, goodbye
[00:41.38]This is our last goodbye
[00:45.17]We know that this is right
[00:49.27]But I’m not, ready to let you go
[00:54.71]Stay for another night
[00:57.45]Can’t help but hold on to what we know
[01:02.88]Stay for another night
[01:11.17]Stay for another night
[01:19.19]Stay for another night
[01:27.48]Stay for another night
[01:35.72]Stay for another night
[01:39.74]I know we’re scared to move on
[01:44.52]Don’t wanna to be so lonely
[01:47.93]But I know our love is gone
[01:52.80]So bright but faded slowly
[01:54.82]So bright but faded slowly
[01:57.16]This is our last goodbye
[02:01.02]Won’t you just hold me tight
[02:03.33]Goodbye, goodbye
[02:05.39]This is our last goodbye
[02:09.14]We know that this is right
[02:13.32]But I’m not, ready to let you go
[02:18.83]Stay for another night
[02:21.44]Can’t help but hold on to what we know
[02:26.95]Stay for another night
[02:29.65]But I’m not, ready to let you go
[02:35.11]Stay for another night
[02:37.07](Just stay the night...)
[02:38.03]Can’t help but hold on to what we know
[02:43.50]Stay for another night
[02:59.96]Stay for another night
[03:14.69](Stay for another night)
[03:16.49]Stay for another night
[03:34.03]Say goodbye
tlyric:
[by:Fumtassure]
[00:15.65]在我们所属于的地方
[00:20.53]只想永远呆在这儿
[00:23.92]现在，爱悄然过期  失效了  故去了
[00:28.83]我想这就是我变得更好的时刻吧  是时候了
[00:33.17]这是我们最后一次说再见
[00:36.98]你难道不紧紧抱住我吗
[00:39.29]再见  再见
[00:41.38]这是我们最后一次说再见
[00:45.17]我们知道离开彼此是正确的选择
[00:49.27]但我还没准备好  就这么让你走
[00:54.71]留下来再陪我一个晚上吧
[00:57.45]只能坚持我们所知道的
[01:02.88]留下来  再陪我一个晚上
[01:11.17]拜托你
[01:19.19]别离开我
[01:27.48]留下来  再陪我一个晚上
[01:35.72]留下来  再陪我一个晚上
[01:39.74]我明白我们害怕继续前进
[01:44.52]不愿变得如此孤独
[01:47.93]然而我也很清醒地认识到  我们的爱已然结束
[01:52.80]如此明亮晃眼  却渐渐褪色
[01:54.82]曾格外明丽闪耀  终究逃不过黯然褪去
[01:57.16]这是我们最后一次说再见
[02:01.02]你不会就这么抱紧我吗
[02:03.33]拜拜  拜拜
[02:05.39]这是我们最后的离别
[02:09.14]我知道这是对的
[02:13.32]只是我不忍心将你割舍
[02:18.83]再陪我一个晚上吧
[02:21.44]只需坚守我们得知的  信任的
[02:26.95]多待一个晚上
[02:29.65]我却没做足放手的准备
[02:35.11]留下来  再陪我一个晚上
[02:37.07]留下来就好了呀...
[02:38.03]只需坚守我们得知的  信任的
[02:43.50]我还是无法就这么看着你远离
[02:59.96]所以
[03:14.69]多陪我一个晚上吧
[03:16.49]留下来  再陪我一个晚上
[03:34.03]然后  我们再做最后的道别
